class.name: UtilEjml

javadoc.text: Various functions that are useful but don't have a clear location that they belong in.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.text: Version string used to indicate which version of EJML is being used.
Give a string of numbers it returns a DenseMatrix

method.name: parseMatrix
method.comment: there is the possibility the first element could be empty
covert it from string to doubles
